title: Five Year Corporate Plan for Wayamba
decision_details: - The Ministry of Wayamba Development and Cultural Affairs has been vested with the responsibility of establishing the Wayamba Secretariat with the objective of coordinating, the economic and infrastructure facilities of development projects and the formulation and implementation of policies.  Accordingly, the five year corporate plan formulated by the Ministry under the patronage of all parties covering the period of 2017-2021 under the sectors of agriculture and irrigation, livestock, fisheries and aquaculture, tourism, human resource development, investment promotion and development of industries and the development of rural infrastructure facilities, aimed at the development of the economic and infrastructure facilities of the Wayamba Province was submitted to the Cabinet by Hon. S.B. Navinne, the Minister of Internal Affairs, Wayamba Development and Cultural Affairs.
